description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync E231W - 23" - LED-backlit LCD Monitor
Take your environmental initiatives to the level with the 23" NEC MultiSync E231W, a widescreen LCD desktop monitor that enhances your desktop computing with bar-setting, eco-friendly benefits. The E231W features an LED-backlit panel that provides the same brightness as other panel types while using 35% less power.
Compared to previous generation NEC LCDs, this model consumes less power overall, radiates less heat, uses less packaging, weighs less, utilizes recycled plastics in its production and is free of hazardous materials such as mercury, halogen and arsenic. These advantages, combined with an ergonomic design and a high-contrast screen, make this model ideal for enterprise environments.
